tasks.name: Implement User Authentication
tasks.description: Set up user authentication using JWT, including login, registration, and session handling.

tasks.name: Build API Endpoints for Product Management
tasks.description: Develop CRUD API endpoints to manage product data, including validation and error handling.

tasks.name: Optimize Database Queries
tasks.description: Review and optimize SQL queries for better performance on high-traffic product pages.

tasks.name: Create Responsive UI for Dashboard
tasks.description: Design and implement responsive layout for user dashboard using Bootstrap and CSS Grid.

tasks.name: Set Up CI/CD Pipeline
tasks.description: Configure automated build, test, and deploy workflows using GitHub Actions and Docker.

tasks.name: Implement Role-Based Access Control
tasks.description: Add role-based access control for admin, user, and guest roles within the application.

tasks.name: Write Unit Tests for Backend Functions
tasks.description: Develop unit tests for backend services to ensure code reliability and catch bugs early.

tasks.name: Integrate Payment Gateway
tasks.description: Set up integration with Stripe API to handle secure transactions and store payment records.

tasks.name: Refactor Legacy Code for Scalability
tasks.description: Clean up and refactor outdated functions to improve scalability and maintainability.
